text:
Josep Maria Benet i Jornet (; 20 June 1940 – 6 April 2020) was a Spanish playwright and television writer. He was born in Barcelona. He was known for creating "Nissaga de poder" (1996–1998), "Laberint d'ombres" (1998–2000), "El cor de la ciutat" (2000–2009) and "Ventdelplà" (2005–2010).
Benet i Jornet died from COVID-19 in Lleida, Spain on 6 April 2020, aged 79.
